# Complexity theory {#complexity_theory}

Complexity theory is the theory of [complex systems](#complex_systems). It takes elements from
- Systems theory;
- Nonlinear systems;
- Network theory;
- Adaptation and self-organization.

It has been called a post-Newtonian paradigm.
